trustfund:
TF054616-PHRD-COSTA RICA: SCALING UP AND
            MAINSTREAMING PAYMENT FOR ENVIRONMENTAL

abstracts.cdata!:
The ddevelopment oobjective for the
            Mainstreaming Market-Based Instruments for Environmental
            Management Project is to enhance the provision of
            environmental services of a national and global significance
            and secure their long-term sustainability through a
            scaled-up payment for environmental services system in Costa
            Rica. The changes extend the closing date of both the loan
            and the grant the project from July 31, 2012, to March 31,
            2014. The extension of the closing date seeks to accommodate
            the project's two-year delay in effectiveness to allow
            for the sustainable and regular capitalization of Costa
            Rica's Payment for Environmental Services (PSA) program
            and Sustainable Biodiversity Fund (FBS). The restructuring
            will allow the project to complete outstanding studies and
            finance administrative costs for the FBS not foreseen at
            project appraisal.
